statements.insert: INSERT INTO $ApplicationStore$_Follow_Account ( Id, AccountId, FollowAccountId, CreatedDate ) VALUES ( #Id#, #AccountId#, #FollowAccountId#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
statements.select: SELECT *,substring('$ApplicationStore$',11,len('$ApplicationStore$')-10) AS ApplicationTag FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY $OrderBy$) AS RowIndex FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Id,AccountId,Id as ThreadId,Title,Content,ModifiedDate,1 AS Sign FROM $ApplicationStore$_Thread WHERE AccountId $WhereClause$ AND Anonymous = 0 AND Status = 1 UNION ALL SELECT C.Id,C.AccountId,C.ThreadId,T.Title,C.Content,C.ModifiedDate,2 AS Sign FROM $ApplicationStore$_Comment AS C LEFT JOIN $ApplicationStore$_Thread AS T ON C.ThreadId=T.Id WHERE C.AccountId $WhereClause$ AND C.Anonymous = 0 ) AS Temp1 ) AS Temp2 ) AS TableIndex WHERE TableIndex.RowIndex BETWEEN $StartIndex$ + 1 AND $StartIndex$ + $PageSize$

SELECT TableIndex.*,Temp.AccountName,Temp.IconPath,substring('$ApplicationStore$',11,len('$ApplicationStore$')-10) AS ApplicationTag FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY $OrderBy$) AS RowIndex FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Id,AccountId,Id as ThreadId,Title,Content,ModifiedDate,1 AS Sign FROM $ApplicationStore$_Thread WHERE AccountId $WhereClause$ AND Anonymous = 0 AND Status = 1 UNION ALL SELECT C.Id,C.AccountId,C.ThreadId,T.Title,C.Content,C.ModifiedDate,2 AS Sign FROM $ApplicationStore$_Comment AS C LEFT JOIN $ApplicationStore$_Thread AS T ON C.ThreadId=T.Id WHERE C.AccountId $WhereClause$ AND C.Anonymous = 0 ) AS Temp1 ) AS Temp2 ) AS TableIndex LEFT JOIN $ApplicationStore$_Member Temp ON TableIndex.AccountId=Temp.AccountId WHERE TableIndex.RowIndex BETWEEN $StartIndex$ + 1 AND $StartIndex$ + $PageSize$

SELECT COUNT(Id) AS 'RowCount' FROM ( SELECT Id,AccountId,Id as ThreadId,Title,Content,ModifiedDate,1 AS Sign FROM $ApplicationStore$_Thread WHERE AccountId $WhereClause$ AND Anonymous = 0 AND Status = 1 UNION ALL SELECT C.Id,C.AccountId,C.ThreadId,T.Title,C.Content,C.ModifiedDate,2 AS Sign FROM $ApplicationStore$_Comment AS C LEFT JOIN $ApplicationStore$_Thread AS T ON C.ThreadId=T.Id WHERE C.AccountId $WhereClause$ AND C.Anonymous = 0 ) AS Temp
SELECT COUNT(Id) AS 'Count' FROM $ApplicationStore$_Follow_Account T WHERE $WhereClause$

SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM ( SELECT * FROM dbo.$ApplicationStore$_Follow_Account where AccountId = #AccountId# AND FollowAccountId = #FollowAccountId# UNION ALL SELECT * FROM dbo.$ApplicationStore$_Follow_Account where FollowAccountId = #AccountId# AND AccountId = #FollowAccountId#) Temp
